name: Flashback (Jessica Zogaric)
description: Flashback is a very brief exploration of life as a male college student who must figure out how he spent his Saturday night.  Based on your choices the protagonist can act as a good Samaritan or a disrespectful brat; it's all up to you. I hope any player will feel desperate to make the correct choices, and play the game multiple times to see different endings.  Just as a warning, this game contains mention of alcohol, and violence, as well as swearing.
